item.title: White door under flat 23 Farjeon rd, 25th June
item.description:
I just witnessed a male dump a white door underneath the flats at Farjeon rd from his small van. I have a video with his reg number included. Then he drove off

item.title: Significant subsidence on Woodhurst Avenue, 25th June
item.description:
This has previously been reported in January and Febuary this year, but the situation is getting worse. This ia a driving hazzard, I recently saw a delivery moped approach the depression in the road, seeing the hole quite the driver braked and swerved onto the other side of the road. Had another vehicle been following close behind, of been on the other side of the road it could have been a serious accident. Although nothing was done, my previous report was closed, stating "We have investigated the report issue and have made contact with the report originator and/or a subsequent commenter to outline further details. This report is now closed on FixMyStreet." No one contacted me, however I can be contacted on 07739 951060. Ths state of the road in Woodhurst Avenue is a disgrace. If there is no action and I have to report this again I will CC this Bromley roads committee and my local councillor.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodhurst Avenue, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car accident has caused tree to uproot, 25th June
item.description:
This was not vandalised, just unfortunate incident. Neighbour car accident drove into our car causing car to shunt forward and uproot the tree. The tree has been removed and placed off public footpath for safety. This happened 24/6/25.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Chorleywood Crescent, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Holly bush overgrowing behind the preschool in The Roberts Hall, Broadway, Bexleyheath, 25th June
item.description:
